Inner Peace: If you are in Calm, draw 3 cards, otherwise Enter Calm.
Inner Peace+: If you are in Calm, draw 4 cards, otherwise Enter Calm.
Like Water: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm, gain 5 Block.
Like Water+: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm, gain 7 Block.
Meditate: Put 1 card from your discard pile into your hand and Retain it. Enter Calm. End your turn.
Meditate+: Put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand and Retain it. Enter Calm. End your turn.
Mental Fortress: Whenever you switch Stances, gain 4 Block.
Mental Fortress+: Whenever you switch Stances, gain 6 Block.
Perseverance: Retain. Gain 5 Block. Whenever this card is Retained, increase its Block by 2.
Perseverance+: Retain. Gain 7 Block. Whenever this card is Retained, increase its Block by 3.
Pray: Gain 3 Mantra. Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.
Pray+: Gain 4 Mantra. Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.
Reach Heaven: Deal 10 damage. Shuffle a Through Violence into your draw pile.
Reach Heaven+: Deal 15 damage. Shuffle a Through Violence into your draw pile.
Rushdown: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw 2 cards.
Sanctity: Gain 6 Block. If the previous card played was a Skill, draw 2 card.
Sanctity+: Gain 9 Block. If the previous card played was a Skill, draw 2 card.
Sands of Time: Retain. Deal 20 damage. Whenever this card is Retained, lower its cost by 1.
Sands of Time+: Retain. Deal 26 damage. Whenever this card is Retained, lower its cost by 1.
Signature Move: Can only be played if this is the only attack in your hand. Deal 30 damage.
Signature Move+: Can only be played if this is the only attack in your hand. Deal 40 damage.
Simmering Fury: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw 2 cards.
Simmering Fury+: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw 3 cards.
Study: At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.
Swivel: Gain 8 Block. The next Attack you play costs 0.
Swivel+: Gain 11 Block. The next Attack you play costs 0.
Talk to the Hand: Deal 5 damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2 Block. Exhaust.
Talk to the Hand+: Deal 7 damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 3 Block. Exhaust.
Tantrum: Deal 3 damage 3 times. Enter Wrath. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
Tantrum+: Deal 3 damage 4 times. Enter Wrath. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
Wallop: Deal 9 damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Wallop+: Deal 12 damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Wave of the Hand: Whenever you gain Block this turn, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
Wave of the Hand+: Whenever you gain Block this turn, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
Weave: Deal 4 damage. Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.
Weave+: Deal 6 damage. Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.
Windmill Strike: Retain. Deal 7 damage. Whenever this card is Retained, increase its damage by 4.
Windmill Strike+: Retain. Deal 10 damage. Whenever this card is Retained, increase its damage by 5.
Wreath of Flame: Your next Attack deals 5 additional damage.
Wreath of Flame+: Your next Attack deals 8 additional damage.
Alpha: Shuffle a Beta into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Alpha+: Innate. Shuffle a Beta into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Blasphemy: Enter Divinity. Die next turn. Exhaust.
Blasphemy+: Retain. Enter Divinity. Die next turn. Exhaust.
Brilliance: Deal 12 damage. Deals additional damage for all Mantra gained this combat.
Brilliance+: Deal 16 damage. Deals additional damage for all Mantra gained this combat.
Conjure Blade: Shuffle an Expunger with X into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Conjure Blade+: Shuffle an Expunger with X+1 into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Deus Ex Machina: Unplayable. When you draw this card, add 2 Miracles into your hand. Exhaust.
Deus Ex Machina+: Unplayable. When you draw this card, add 3 Miracles into your hand. Exhaust.
Deva Form: Ethereal. At the start of your turn, gain Energy and increase this gain by 1.
Deva Form+: At the start of your turn, gain Energy and increase this gain by 1.
Devotion: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Mantra.
Devotion+: At the start of your turn, gain 3 Mantra.
Establishment: Whenever a card is Retained, lower its cost by 1.
Establishment+: Innate. Whenever a card is Retained, lower its cost by 1.
Judgment: If the enemy has 30 or less HP, set their HP to 0.
Judgment+: If the enemy has 40 or less HP, set their HP to 0.
Lesson Learned: Deal 10 damage. If Fatal, Upgrade a random card in your deck. Exhaust.
Lesson Learned+: Deal 13 damage. If Fatal, Upgrade a random card in your deck. Exhaust.
Master Reality: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.
Omniscience: Choose a card in your draw pile. Play the chosen card twice and Exhaust it. Exhaust.
Ragnarok: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy 5 times.
Ragnarok+: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy 6 times.
Scrawl: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.
Spirit Shield: Gain 3 Block for each card in your hand.
Spirit Shield+: Gain 4 Block for each card in your hand.
Vault: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.
Wish: Choose one: Gain 6 Plated Armor, 3 Strength, or 25 Gold. Exhaust.
Wish+: Choose one: Gain 8 Plated Armor, 4 Strength, or 30 Gold. Exhaust.
Ascender's Bane: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck. Ethereal.
Curse of the Bell: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck.
Decay: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
Doubt: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak.
Necronomicurse: Unplayable. There is no escape from this Curse.
Normality: Unplayable. You cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.
Pain: Unplayable. While in hand, lose 1 HP when other cards are played.
Parasite: Unplayable. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.
Pride: Innate. At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Regret: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Shame: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.
Burn: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
Burn+: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 4 damage.
Void: Unplayable. When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. Ethereal.
Body Slam+: Deal damage equal to your current Block.
Havoc+: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.
Dark Embrace+: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw 1 card.
Infernal Blade+: Add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Barricade+: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Corruption+: Skills cost 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.
Exhume+: Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Distraction+: Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Setup+: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 until it is played.
Bullet Time+: You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.
Envenom+: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.
Nightmare+: Choose a card. Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand. Exhaust.
Phantasmal Killer+: On your next turn, your Attacks deal double damage.
Tools of the Trade+: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.
Madness+: A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
Mind Blast+: Innate. Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.
Apotheosis+: Upgrade ALL of your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
Magnetism+: At the start of each turn, add a random colorless card to your hand.
Mayhem+: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile.
Beta+: Shuffle an Omega into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Recursion+: Evoke your next Orb. Channel the Orb that was just Evoked.
Recycle+: Exhaust a card. Gain Energy equal to its cost.
White Noise+: Add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Creative AI+: At the start of each turn, add a random Power card to your hand.
Rushdown+: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw 2 cards.
Study+: At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.
Master Reality+: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.
Omniscience+: Choose a card in your draw pile. Play the chosen card twice and Exhaust it. Exhaust.
Scrawl+: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.
Vault+: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.

Curse of the Bell+: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Doubt+: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak.
Necronomicurse+: Unplayable. There is no escape from this Curse.

Pain+: Unplayable. While in hand, lose 1 HP when other cards are played.
Parasite+: Unplayable. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.
Pride+: Innate. At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Regret+: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Shame+: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.
